com.redhat.rhn.domain.org.usergroup

Class UserGroupFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.hibernate.HibernateFactory
      • com.redhat.rhn.domain.org.usergroup.UserGroupFactory

  • public class UserGroupFactory
extends HibernateFactory
    UserGroupFactory - the singleton class used to fetch and store com.redhat.rhn.domain.org.usergroup.UserGroup objects from the database.
